For exa____, t__ lack o_ face t_ face inter______ may ma__ people mo__ selfish. On the other hand, the wide availability of social media may make people more communicative.
data.fullContent: The use of social media has greatly increased in recent years. Some have thought that this may have a negative impact on social relations. For example, the lack of face to face interaction may make people more selfish. On the other hand, the wide availability of social media may make people more communicative.
data.answer: 近年来，社交媒体的使用大大增加。有些人认为这可能会对社会关系产生负面影响。例如，缺乏面对面的互动可能会使人更自私。另一方面，社交媒体的广泛使用可能会使人们更容易沟通。
